snippet: Doug Wright caters to the entertainment industry's more unusual requests, producing what he calls “script-specific props."
abstract: Artist and set decorator Doug Wright caters to the movie industry's more unusual requests, producing custom pieces of what he calls 'script-specific props'; his latest endeavor is an elaborate custom-designed codpiece for Tom Cruise's character in the movie Rock of Ages.
lead_paragraph: Doug Wright caters to the entertainment industry's more unusual requests, producing what he calls “script-specific props."

headline.seo: Prop Maker Doug Wright and Tom Cruise’s Codpiece
